application-cta.defaultMessage: Log me in on Mastodon to automatically follow new accounts

csv-cta.defaultMessage: Generate the file to import on Mastodon

csv-import-explanation.defaultMessage: Now you can import and follow those accounts, all at once, here.

csv-import-warning.defaultMessage: Beware, the import process can take some time on your Mastodon instance.

direct-message-cta.defaultMessage: Send me a message on Mastodon when an account I should follow is created

explicit-list-csv-cta.defaultMessage: Generate the file to import these {count} people on Mastodon

explicit-list-cta.defaultMessage: Get the list of people you already follow on Mastodon

list-explanation.defaultMessage: Uncheck people to remove them from the generated CSV.

mastodon-following-counts.defaultMessage: You already follow {total} accounts but you are missing {alreadyFollowed}.

mastodon-following-cta.defaultMessage: Get the list of people you already follow on Mastodon with {acct}

mastodon-handle-comment.defaultMessage: You should add your @user@instance.social in your Twitter bio or username to help people find you on Mastodon.

show-list-cta.defaultMessage: Show the list of people to follow on Mastodon

step2.defaultMessage: 2. Follow people that are already on Mastodon

step3.defaultMessage: 3. Tell us how you want us to help you follow people that will move on Mastodon later!

twitter-following-counts.defaultMessage: You follow {total} persons on Twitter and it looks like are already on Mastodon.

twitter-following-cta.defaultMessage: Get the list of people you follow on Twitter

twitter-mastodon-account.defaultMessage: We managed to extract your Mastodon account: '{acct}'

twitter-mastodon-account-not-found.defaultMessage: We didn't managed a Mastodon account from your public data.

twitter-name.defaultMessage: We found you on Twitter, your name is: '{name}'
